rule_description_1: - Cromatic Clans is a card game using a 10-card deck.
rule_description_2: - Players take turns playing one card each.
rule_description_3: - Players can stack up to three cards.
rule_description_4: - Some cards unleash special effects when placed third.
rule_description_5: - The third card is played face down.
rule_description_6: - After playing all cards, compare card values per column to determine the winner.
rule_description_7: - Sum and compare column numbers by color, using the color with the highest total.
rule_description_8: - The player winning the most columns is the victor.
